content: Absolutely wonderful stay! The pool view was breathtaking and the staff was incredibly attentive. The room was spotless and modern.
Great location and beautiful property. The restaurant offered excellent dining options. Only minor issue was slow WiFi in some areas.
The room was not very clean and the bathroom was outdated. The staff was friendly and the location was good.
The staff was very friendly and the location was perfect. The room was spacious and the bed was comfortable.
The hotel was clean and the staff was very helpful. The location was good and the restaurant had great food.
The hotel was very noisy and the room was not very clean. The staff was friendly and the location was good.
